content:
My Favorite Murder is a fantastic podcast that has gained a huge following, and for good reason. Karen and Georgia's chemistry and banter are infectious, and they have a way of making true crime stories both entertaining and thought-provoking.

I think you'll really enjoy their podcast, and I'm curious to hear what you think of it! If you need more recommendations or have any questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy listening!

(And don't forget to stay sexy, don't get murdered!)
